sentences.cn: 碳水化合物的大量摄入

sentences.en: a leak on the air intake to the carburettor
Add pasta to your salads to bump up your fibre intake.
sentences.cn: 在色拉中加入意大利面条，增加你的纤维摄入量。

sentences.en: All the cells and tissues in the body benefit from the increased intake of oxygen.
sentences.cn: 体内所有的细胞与组织都从增加的氧气吸入量中受益。

sentences.en: Cutting food intake by half is an incredibly difficult thing for anyone to do.
sentences.cn: 将进食量减半对任何人来说都是件非常难的事。

sentences.en: Everyone benefited from limiting their intake of tea to just three or four cups a day.
sentences.cn: 每天只喝三四杯茶对身体有益。

sentences.en: I heard, even over the babble of the crowd, a sharp, shocked intake of breath.
sentences.cn: 即便人声鼎沸，我还是听到有人猛地倒抽一口冷气。

sentences.en: Intake in state primary schools is down by 10 %.
sentences.cn: 公立小学入学人数下降了10%.

sentences.en: Nutritionists say only 33% of our calorie intake should be from fat.
sentences.cn: 营养学家说我们所摄入的卡路里中只应有33％来自脂肪。

sentences.en: The Department is gearing up for increased intake of students.
sentences.cn: 这个系正在为扩大招生做好准备.

sentences.en: The intake of gasoline was stopped by a clogged fuel line.
sentences.cn: 汽油的注入由于管道阻塞而停止了.

sentences.en: The intake valve was jammed open.
They compared the fat intake of groups of vegetarians and meat eaters, and matched their diets up with levels of harmful blood fats.
sentences.cn: 他们比较了素食者组与肉食者组的脂肪摄入量，并将他们的膳食与血脂超标水平对应起来。

sentences.en: to reduce your daily intake of salt
Try to reduce your intake of fat.
sentences.cn: 尽量减少脂肪的摄入量。

sentences.en: Universities were ill-equipped to meet the massive intake of students.
sentences.cn: 各大学设备不足，难以满足招入的大量学生的要求。

sentences.en: We are constantly being reminded to cut down our fat intake.
sentences.cn: 不断有人提醒我们要减少脂肪的摄入量。

sentences.en: Your intake of alcohol should not exceed two units per day.
sentences.cn: 每天的饮酒量不应超过两个计量单位。

phrases.tran_cn: 卡路里摄入量；热量摄取
吸入液流，吸入流动；进入流道
进气道；进气口；进汽门孔
进水口，取水口；水摄入（量）

trans.tran_cn: 吸入，进气，（液体等）进入口，摄入，摄取，纳入（数）量
trans.tran_en: the amount of food, drink etc that you take into your body
